title: WATCH:  Zoo animals beat the heat in China
description: Pandas played with ice blocks, tigers enjoyed a dip in the water and lemurs feasted on fruit and popsicles in a Chinese zoo to cool down in the summer heat.

title: Fulton County DA empaneling new grand jury to weigh Trump election charges
description: The DA probing efforts to overturn the 2020 presidential election in Georgia is empaneling a new grand jury to weigh possible charges against former President Trump.

title: Crane at fire-ravaged Notre Dame hoists giant wood trusses to the cathedral's roof
description: A crane hoisted massive oak trusses from a barge in Paris and onto Notre Dame Cathedral on Tuesday in a spectacular operation to rebuild the fire-ravaged monument and bring it back to life by December 2024

title: Man takes woman hostage in hotel room at Caesars casino, Las Vegas police say
description: Las Vegas police say a man has taken a woman hostage at the Caesars Palace Hotel & Casino

title: Charles Manson follower Leslie Van Houten released from prison
description: Former Charles Manson follower Leslie Van Houten has been released from prison after serving 53 years behind bars.

title: Native American leaders visit site of archeological dig to find remains of boarding school students
description: Archeologists have resumed digging for student remains.

title: Elizabeth Holmes on track for early release from 11-year prison sentence
description: Disgraced Theranos CEO Elizabeth Holmes apparently has been behaving well enough so far during her more than 11-year prison sentence for duping investors in her blood-testing hoax to be eligible for release nearly two years ahead of schedule, according...

title: Insurance companies sue energy corporation blamed for helping start Colorado wildfire
description: Dozens of insurance companies are suing Minneapolis-based Xcel Energy to recoup money paid out to homes and businesses lost in Colorado’s most destructive wildfire in 2021

title: Susan Lorincz pleads not guilty in fatal shooting of Ajike Owens
description: Susan Lorincz, the woman charged with manslaughter in the fatal shooting of her neighbor Ajike “AJ” Owens on June 2 in Ocala, Florida pleaded not guilty on Monday.

title: Cargo boat fire that killed 2 firefighters put out after 6 days
description: The massive fire aboard a cargo ship docked in a Newark port that took the lives of two firefighters has been put out, according to the U.S. Coast Guard.

title: Biden critic Gal Luft charged with failing to register as foreign agent
description: Gal Luft, a dual U.S.-Israeli citizen who has accused the Biden family of corruption, has been charged by federal prosecutors with failing to register as a foreign agent.

title: Judge declines to block Microsoft's record $69B deal to buy Activision Blizzard
description: A federal judge has handed Microsoft a major victory by declining to block its looming $69 billion takeover of video game company Activision Blizzard

title: Greenpeace activist fined for crash-landing parachute in stadium before soccer match
description: A German surgeon has been ordered to pay a fine of $7,900 for parachuting into the stadium before a European Championship match in Munich two years ago as part of a botched climate protest

title: Appeals court again blocks construction on Mountain Valley Pipeline
description: A federal appeals court has again blocked construction on a segment of a contentious natural gas pipeline being built through Virginia and West Virginia

title: Suspect arrested after Humvee plows into Army headquarters building at Georgia base
description: Army investigators say a person has been arrested after a military Humvee crashed into the office building for commanders and other top leaders at Fort Stewart, Georgia

title: Bank of America ordered to pay more than $100 million to customers
description: Bank of America harmed hundreds of thousands of customers, a federal agency said.

title: US probes complaints that Ford Escape doors can open while SUVs are being driven
description: U.S. auto safety regulators are investigating complaints that the doors on some Ford Escapes can open while the SUVs are being driven

title: Thailand's prime minister, who took power in a coup, quits politics
description: Thailand’s Prime Minister Prayuth Chan-ocha, who served almost nine years in office after seizing power in a 2014 military coup, has announced he is leaving politics

title: Passenger plane veers off runway after landing in Somalia's capital
description: State media in Somalia say a small passenger plane veered off the runway on arrival at the international airport in Mogadishu

title: Evan Gershkovich's parents say Biden promised 'to do whatever it takes'
description: The parents of journalist Evan Gershkovich say they remain confident the U.S. government will do all it can to bring their son home.

title: WATCH:  Lava bubbles as volcano erupts in Iceland
description: Lava is seen bubbling after a volcano erupted in Iceland, near the capital Reykjavik, following intense earthquake activity in the area.

title: 6 dead in helicopter crash near Mount Everest
description: Six people, including a pilot, were killed in a helicopter crash near Mount Everest in Nepal on Tuesday, officials said.

title: Husband arrested for alleged hit-and-run murder of his own wife
description: The husband of a woman who was found dead by the side of a road last month has been arrested for the alleged hit-and-run murder of his wife.

title: UK wage growth remains strong amid inflation; unemployment unexpectedly increases
description: Official figures in the U.K. show that wages are still rising at record highs, as inflation remains stubbornly high

title: Trump seeks lengthy delay of classified docs trial, citing upcoming election
description: In a late-night filing, lawyers for former President Trump have called for a lengthy delay of his trial on charges related to his handling of classified documents.

title: Prosecutor alleges tourists were not warned before deadly volcano eruption
description: A New Zealand prosecutor says tourists received no health and safety warnings before they landed on the country’s most active volcano ahead of a 2019 eruption that killed 22 people

title: Pilot escapes with minor injuries when small plane crashes into hangar roof
description: Authorities say a pilot escaped with only minor injuries after a single-engine plane crashed nose-first into the roof of a hangar at a Southern California airport
